synopsis.code:
mal_info_revision = element revision { attribute version { text } ?, attribute docversion { text } ?, attribute pkgversion { text } ?, attribute date { xsd:date } ?, attribute status { "stub" | "incomplete" | "draft" | "review" | "final" } ?, attribute * - (mal:* | local:*) { text } *,
mal_block_title ?, mal_block_desc ? }
